name: Zombies vs House - Source
description:
Found a fix for the jerkiness. Seems to be smoother now.

This is a game for the GameDev.TV game jam! Source code is in the download. I used Unity 2021.3.3

Made by two people:

Noah - mrnoah99 on itch.io

Dave - dstew99 on itch.io and techdave99 on youtube.

Zombies have wrecked your house and now it is time for the zombies to pay.

Notice:

  • There is no sound
  • you win when you kill all of the zombies
  • it was originally called "Death Fortress 2". That is what the executable is named.
